revised_title: Proceedings of the Royal Society of London: List of Papers Read on December 9, 1897
topics: Dielectric Constants of Organic Bodies and Electrolytes
tldr: This issue of the Proceedings of the Royal Society of London features a list of papers presented on December 9, 1897, covering topics such as the densities of carbonic oxide, carbonic anhydride, and nitrous oxide, the dynamical theory of tides, and the dielectric constants of organic bodies and electrolytes.
